err.message: AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 20000ms: expected '<div.text-red-600.mt-1.text-xs>' to have text 'Password should be atleast 8 characters and should contain combination of uppercase, lowercase & numbers', but the text was 'Both passwords need to be the same'
